title: Lincoln: No further action over 11-year-old boy's death
article: A man arrested on suspicion of murder and a woman arrested on suspicion of manslaughter over a boy's death face no further action, police have said. The 11-year-old boy was found "unwell" at a property in Geneva Avenue in Lincoln in January last year and died in hospital a short time later. Lincolnshire Police said his death was not now being treated as suspicious.The woman, 31, and the man, 33, were released following "a prolonged investigation", a spokesperson said. A file was being prepared for the coroner, the spokesperson added. "Our thoughts are with his family at this time," police said.
